Topic.Title: Jakk's lessons: Steps to posting on AxeUk.

Posts.EditableText:
This could save a lot of time...

1)One person ranting about something hardly anyone cares about 
2)Ste points out the stupidity of this OR if the post was MADE by ste, Davidw does. 
3)Person who made the post insults them back in a comical fashion
4)A bunch of others join in, insulting each other.
5)Alex locks the post

Wow... Things have gone to hell.

Posts.EditableText: maybe if DavidW learnt how to stfu, there wouldn't be so many "fights" on the forum Why is it always me? I announced i was "18 today", and he replied with a stupid remark, which was unnecessary. I think that's called being provoked, so if DavidW starts an argument it's my fault... right ok. Here's an idea Jakk, why don't you stop being a stupid little soft cucumber trying to give me steak over a forum, and go outside in the real world, and try and run your mouth of there, and see how much of a beating you get for it. You know your safe on here, that's the only reason you can speak out. [cleaned]
